data.title: California orders Weedmaps to stop advertising unlicensed marijuana businesses
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: The California Bureau of Cannabis Control sent a cease-and-desist letter last month to Irvine-based Ghost Management Group, the owner of popular marijuana dispensary finder Weedmaps.com, ordering the company to stop advertising unlicensed operators or face unspecified “criminal and administrative penalties.” Sacramento authorities recently sent their own cease-and-desist letter to the company over the same issue. Weedmaps is one […]
